name: Warka Flarka Flim Flam
description: From the creator of ‘BLARP!’ , ‘L U N E’ and ‘My Lil’ Donut’ comes new Fast-paced, Physical game for Vive : “Warka Flarka Flim Flam” . Every mistake you make will be punished, starting you over again and again on your Journey to become the #1 Warka of Flarkas!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 50 MB available space
